title: It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Hallmark! Writing a Made-for-TV Christmas Movie: The Unofficial Guide
description: Have you ever watched a Hallmark Christmas movie and thought, “I bet I could write one of those?” With this book, you can! We’ll show you how to write and market your own made-for-TV Cozy Christmas Romance, even if you’ve never written a script before! We’ve broken the process down into ten easy-to-follow steps, • The 10 subgenres of Cozy Christmas Romances (CCRs) and why they’re important to your script • The 4 things you need to do before writing your first draft • The tricks, tropes and requirements of the genre • How to check out your story idea with our CCR checklist • Tips for getting your script to producers and networks that make CCRs It’s Beginning to Look a Lot Like Hallmark gives you the secret sauce, the rules and special insider tips for writing your own Cozy Christmas Romance Movie!
author: Heather Hughes
